descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Comic Sans MS][size=2][/size][/font][/center][center][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#f4cccc]This is  Niah, My very fist attempt (a very poor one at that) at a follower mod. She will use any face textures you have installed ( I could not get them to be standalone) other than that you will not need any other mods for her [/color]
[color=#f4cccc]Requirements :[/color]
[color=#ffe599]Skyrim up to date.
[/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#d9ead3]And if her to look exactly like she does in the screenshots i would recommend fair skin complexion[/color][/font] v7.9[/center][center][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#f4cccc]The armor is also not included it is the [/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#f4f4f4]black sacrament armor by [/color][/font][b][color=#f4f4f4]AmethystDeceiver[/color]
[color=#f4f4f4](Please tell me if there are any bugs and i can attemp to fix them!) [/color]
[color=#d9d2e9]You can find her in the frostfruit inn in Rorikstead[/color]
[/b]


Credits [color=#f4f4f4]
Enhanced character edit by [/color][b][color=#f4f4f4]ECE team[/color][/b][color=#f4f4f4]
[/color]Fair skin complexion by HHaleyy
KS hairdos by Kalilies, shocky and stealthic

Mods used in screen shots
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#f4f4f4]Project enb 
[/color][/font][size=2]Arise - Chapter 1 - The Black Sacrament[/size] [color=#f4f4f4]by [b]AmethystDeceiver[/b][/color]
 [/center]
author: Jade
